main event: A meteorite fell from the sky and struck a woman in Sylacauga, Alabama on November 6, 1954.
interesting points: The meteorite weighed about 8 lbs and was dark in color with an angular shape., The object fell through the roof of a house and knocked the woman, Mrs. Elizabeth Hodges, to the floor., The fall of the meteorite was observed during partly cloudy weather., Only one piece of the meteorite was found at the site., The case was investigated by the United States Air Force under Project Blue Book.
witness description: Mrs. Elizabeth Hodges, who was struck by the meteorite
